entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve handling when setting an unseekable stream as a tar entry's DataStream #76690
    8.0.0
  • AsParallel causes extremely slow 'WorkloadJitting' performance in BenchmarkDotNet benchmark #76689
  • NativeAOT StripSymbols should allow options for what to do with the symbol file #76686
    8.0.0
  • Why is `CCKeyDerivationPBKDF` not used in non-macOS Apple platforms? #76684
  • Microsoft.DotNet.CoreSetup.Test.HostActivation.StartupHooks.Muxer_activation* tests failed #76681
  • Linker CI build failure: Arcade SDK cannot be found in OSX x64 #76680
  • CI Linux failure: SyncHttpHandler_HttpProtocolTests_Dribble.GetAsync_ResponseHasNormalLineEndings_Success #76678
  • WASM CI failure: System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Http.Tests.HttpRequestMessageTest.BlobUri_Marshal_CorrectValues_Browser #76676
  • Buffer for enumerator #76675
  • Implementation of a `static` `virtual` method in base type is getting ignored by runtime in context of derived type #76673
  • [wasm] [question] JSInterop usage with javascript 'buf' data type #76672
  • [mono] Incorrect version comparison in the loader #76664
  • [wasm] Cannot handle variables of type dynamic #76663
  • Improve Networking docs #76661
    8.0.0
  • `Monitor.TryEnter` sometimes fails even if `Monitor.IsEntered` returns `true` #76660
  • Investigate size of `.rela.dyn` section on Linux #76657
    8.0.0
  • Remove runtime dependencies on libstdc++ #76655
    8.0.0
  • [release/3.1] CI failures: System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.PlatformHandler_HttpProtocolTests #76654
  • [release/3.1] CI failure: CertificateCreation.CertificateRequestUsageTests.AlwaysVersion3 - unable to build chain to self-signed root for signer (null) #76653
  • [release/3.1] CI failure: System.Globalization.Tests.IdnMappingIdnaConformanceTests.GetUnicode_Invalid #76651
  • PEReader doesn't work with "IsLoadedImage" and "PrefetchMetadata" options #76648

Closed

  • [Perf -7%] System.Text.Perf_Utf8Encoding.GetBytes #45554
    Future
  • MARSHALLED_UNICODE_STRING[] array marshalling leaks memory #76584
    7.0.x
  • [NativeAot] Devirtualization opportunity around field loads #74000
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'opcode == CEE_LDFLD && objType != nullptr' in 'ReturnTestsType:Return.LocalStructFieldByRef_Invalid_ReturnPtrToStack(Struct):byref:this' during 'Importation' #74593
    8.0.0
  • Mutating results of `JsonSerializerContext.GetTypeInfo` can result in corruption of static metadata properties #76682
    7.0.0
  • Extremely high and unexpected memory commit sizes using DOTNET_GCHeapHardLimit #75538
    Future
  • System.Threading.RateLimiting consistent naming for permit count #76557
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Rsa.Tests.EncryptDecrypt_Span.RsaDecryptPkcs1LeadingZero test is failing on Windows.10.Amd64.ServerRS5 #76611
  • Consider obsoleting `RSA.EncryptValue`, `RSA.DecryptValue` #73969
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'src->OperIs(GT_LCL_VAR, GT_LCL_FLD, GT_FIELD, GT_IND, GT_OBJ, GT_CALL, GT_MKREFANY, GT_RET_EXPR, GT_COMMA, GT_CNS_VEC) || ((src->TypeGet() != TYP_STRUCT) && src->OperIsSIMD())' #76550
    8.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun\\coreroot_determinism\\coreroot_determinism\\coreroot_determinism.cmd #75820
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/VS-ia64-JIT/V2.0-RTM/b539509/b539509/b539509.sh #75819
    7.0.0
  • Failures in checked/release asm diffs #76347
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] dotnet run doesn't work for relative path #76609
    7.0.0
  • VerifyHeap fails on frozen heap #76232
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add a JsonEncodedText.Value property #69716
    8.0.0
  • Unable to run binaries located on network shares #74418
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\opt\\cse\\HugeField1\\HugeField1.cmd #73139
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT\\jit64\\opt\\cse\\HugeField1\\HugeField1.cmd #43818
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: ilasm round-trip HugeField2 #38529
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: ilasm round-trip hugeexpr1 #38515
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Ensure we cleanup the marshalling for elements of collections (stateful and stateless) #76693
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • API Dept - Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting #76692
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [Release/7.0] Delete dangling thread session states #76691
    Servicing-consider, EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use CCKeyDerivationPBKDF on iOS #76688
    area-System.Security
  • Fix triple slash documentation for System.Runtime.Intrinsics #76687
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Enable sourcelink in source-build #76685
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Make resolver GetTypeInfo methods return new instances on every call #76683
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Low memory fixes #76674
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Preference locals away from PUTARG_REG killed registers #76671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging a failing debugger test #76670
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][interp] Optimize out some ldloca uses #76669
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Abs intrinsics for Amd64 #76668
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Fix incorrect version comparison in loader #76665
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono, community-contribution
  • Check for non-valid compare chains (#76566) #76662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Failfast on Vector256 test failure #76656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Robustify speech recognition test #76652
    area-System.Speech
  • Add RIDs for Tizen 7.0 #76650
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Revert "Revert frozen RuntimeType objects and write barriers for frozen objects" #76649
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] Cleanup, share more code between x86 and x64 in `genAllocLclFrame` #76647
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Ensure we cleanup the marshalling for elements of collections (stateful and stateless) #76629
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [release/7.0][workloads] Bump the runtime net6 versions for GA #76270
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Fix triple slash documentation for System/System.Numerics #76103
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fix gtGetClassHandle for static fields (R2R only) #74075
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Multi-targeting logic in Source Generators in NuGet packages doesn't work transitively #75813
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.11
  • Replace assert with BADCODE #75068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Remove locks from COM events delegate management. #76035
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 6.0.11
  • [release/6.0] Backport consolidation of Newtonsoft versions #76522
    area-Meta, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0][mono] Fix iOS/tvOS build with Xcode 14 #76448
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix debugging an app that has another .NET Wasm instance in a service worker #76075
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.11
  • [release/6.0] [metadata] Skip null vtable entries when checking covariant return overrides #76327
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] [mono][arm] Fix rethrow instruction size #76392
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Bring back readability lost in .Net 6, and stop emitting BOM. #75637
    Servicing-approved, area-Serialization, 6.0.11
  • [release/6.0] Fix binary serialization of DateTime with DCS and add test. #75650
    Servicing-approved, area-Serialization, 6.0.11
  • [release/6.0] Fix `DataContractJsonSerializer`'s handling of -0.0 #75643
    Servicing-approved, area-Serialization, 6.0.11
  • [release/6.0] Allow for null XmlSerializers when loading pre-gen from mappings. #75638
    Servicing-approved, area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.11
  • [hot_reload] Fix unresolved token when new nested structs are used #76618
    area-EnC-mono
  • Updating Vector128 to have its software fallback be 2x Vector64<T> ops #76592
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Obsolete `RSA.EncryptValue` and `RSA.DecryptValue` #76514
    area-System.Security, breaking-change, community-contribution
  • Rename request count to permit count on System.Threading.RateLimiting #76558
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • remove LangVersion workarounds #76394
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Ensure Max/Min for floating-point on x86/x64 are not handled as commutative #75772
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.11
  • [release/7.0] [hot_reload] Fix unresolved token when new nested structs are used #76625
    Servicing-approved, area-EnC-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add workaround for Windows 10 (1903) bug to RSABCrypt #76633
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Rename request count to permit count on System.Threading.RateLimiting #76623
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] fix lower heap hard limit condition for regions #76588
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix Interop.Gdi32.StartDoc p/invoke #76582
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Drawing, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0][Android] Backport fix NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces #76565
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, os-android, 7.0.0
  • Include bitcasts in an assert #76628
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make sure the initial mark list size is capped #76083
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Disable failing debugger test #76667
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Don't scan bricks of frozen segments in verify_heap #76645
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove all uses of `SString::Printf()` accepting `WCHAR` #76571
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • roll-back helix change from arm32 #76646
    test-enhancement, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Update branding to 6.0.11 #76620
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocking
  • Support Arm64 "constructed" constants in SuperPMI asm diffs #76616
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Backport: work around GitHub .patch URL issue" #76659
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] Restore correct llvm 14 version for macOS too #76640
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix FOH for SOS #76586
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add `JsonEncodedText.Value` #76545
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Avoid __vsnprintf_s for printing method names #76619
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [ilasm] Lazily allocate memory in Indx256 #76590
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Streamline root commands and cli helpers #76537
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Remove unused EmitBlobWithRelocs method #76631
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • cherry-picking small refactor fix from 7.0 #76634
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix numeric IntPtr behavioral changes analyzer findings #75557
    area-Meta

Updated
